textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (Nora seems to be gone..        But her stuff is still here.)

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Uh, excuse me.        Have you seen the girl that was with me?

textBox.name: Innkeeper
textBox.text: I guarantee she has not passed here since yesterday.

textBox.name: Innkeeper
textBox.text: At least not while I was awake.

textBox.name: Innkeeper
textBox.text: I hope she hasn’t gone out at night.

textBox.name: Innkeeper
textBox.text: Mmhmm.          There have been rumors of a creature roaming the woods.

textBox.name: Innkeeper
textBox.text: After darkness falls it can be heard,        dragging something through the forest grounds.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (A creature..        Nora mentioned something like that..)

textBox.name: Innkeeper
textBox.text: How would I know?          Hopefully far far away by now!

textBox.name: Innkeeper
textBox.text: Can’t have something like that ruin business at the most profitable time of the year!

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Do you want it gone?      I could help.

textBox.name: Innkeeper
textBox.text: Now..         don’t get me wrong missss-     ster.

textBox.name: Innkeeper
textBox.text: But you look in no condition to deal with something like that.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (I suppose that's fair..       I don’t even have a weapon..)

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (...But if that creature really attacked me..      I might remember something when I see it...)

textBox.name: Innkeeper
textBox.text: Listen,          as a caring man and you being a well paying customer,         I’d rather have you stay in this safe little old Inn.

textBox.name: Innkeeper
textBox.text: As soon as the town gathered enough Ignaz we can contact Indarr’s hunter guild to deal with the problem.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: May I ask..    What is an “Ignaz”?

textBox.name: Innkeeper
textBox.text: You’re kidding right?      Ignaz?      The currency of this region.      These coins?

textBox.name: Innkeeper
textBox.text: The thing you can exchange for goods and services like food and shelter.

textBox.name: Innkeeper
textBox.text: Don’t you give me those puppy eyes..        We all gotta earn our money someway.

textBox.name: Innkeeper
textBox.text: I’ll give you a heads up if I see that girl though.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (Ignaz..     He said they would pay hunters to get rid of the creature..)

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (...           I wonder how Nora got her Ignaz..)

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: That’s my line...      Where were you?

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: It’s a good lookout spot..    Got a nice overview of town              ...and a lot of trees.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (I’m not even going to question that.)

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (Hm..        now that I’m looking at her..         She has a blade.)

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: A hunter?         Where did that come from?

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: I asked the Innkeeper about Ignaz.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: They mentioned people hunt things for money and It’s hard to come by.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Would you..           Like to get something to eat?

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Let’s go get you some food then~

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: To town square!         I spotted a market from the roof before!

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (Why did she suddenly get so energetic-!)

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (She patched me up,      gave me a logbook,      paid for a room,       and is getting me some food now..)

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (If I’d find that creature,          I could get some money AND it might help me remember something.)

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (I can do it..           I feel a lot better than yesterday.)

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: A night active creature.        Probably has a den somewhere close, maybe a cave or a hole.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: It’s den should be somewhat close to the village considering people heard it dragging things.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: This also means it's more of a scavenger rather than a trapping type..

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Either hunting things bigger than itself or does not have the means to carry its prey.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: I suppose the dragging could also have nothing to do with a thing and rather it just being the noise the creature makes while traversing ground..

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (She patched me up,      gave me a logbook,      paid for a room,       and is getting me some food now..)

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (If I’d find that creature,          I could get some money AND it might help me remember something.)

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (I can do it..           I feel a lot better than yesterday.)

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: A night active creature.        Probably has a den somewhere close, maybe a cave or a hole.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: It’s den should be somewhat close to the village considering people heard it dragging things.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: This also means it's more of a scavenger rather than a trapping type..

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Either hunting things bigger than itself or does not have the means to carry its prey.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: I suppose the dragging could also have nothing to do with a thing and rather it just being the noise the creature makes while traversing ground..

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Or maybe nothing at all..    Echoing noises can be quite deceiving..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: But am I that horrible that you have to run away from me..?

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: I know I’m not helping in clearing up confusions with your amnesia and all..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: I probably also was a bit too energetic and just overwhelming for you...       and-

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: I want to buy you food as well.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Are you..         Upset that I’m buying stuff for you..?

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Well you have been so kind to me..

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: And I have done nothing for you..

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: I won’t just accept these things.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: I’m not that kindhearted,       don't worry..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Besides,        You are hurt.        If you want to pay me back for some reason do it after you’re better again.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: But...      why me?        ...I did nothing to diserve this...

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: You better accept it though..      No take backs.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: And no more asking so many questions..        I’m not good with that.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: You will have to accept that as well.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Why are you even in the forest in the first place?

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: You don’t even have a weapon!

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Well,       I didn’t want to ask you to help me!     That would defeat the point!

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: You getting hurt again would also defeat the point!

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Why are they always so stubborn..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Let me at least join you.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: That’s Ok.      Just..           lower your breathing a bit.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (Why now?      I thought it was night active..)

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Huh..      Well,    let's head over there.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: (Great ears is an understatement..      Not even {bold}I{/bold} hear anything..)

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: (Not only that..    But either I am the best first aid applier in the galaxy..    Or this is one sturdy boi.)

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: (Well,    “thing”.            Besides shrugging off borderline mortal wounds it is definitely no mammal.)

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: (Its body structure resembles a boy in his..     Maybe,       twenties?)

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: (But no reproductive organs.        Barely visible muscle.       No navel.)

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Yeah..      But there is no cave..         Maybe it can fly?

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Uhhhm Zayn.    Mind taking a step back?

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Y-yeah!      Like the ones in rpg’s!

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: I can’t believe they actually exist...

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: A creature made out of slime..      No wonder I didn't hear breathing...

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Are..        you sure that’s a good idea?...

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Of course...      how could I forget metaphysical communication...

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Besides,     aren’t slimes like..     always enemies?

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Or at least are..          Highly acidic?

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Maybe that’s how it processes nourishments.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: But don’t worry,       It doesn’t see us as food.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: ..Nah but really,        how can you tell?

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Sure.      As long as you’re gentle I don’t think it will mind.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Maybe it just..     Had somewhere it wanted to go.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Well at least that clears up some things.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Mainly that this is definitely not a threat.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: And certainly not whatever attacked me..

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Uh..      want to get some food now?

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (...She really wanted to touch that slime, huh.)

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: (I really wanted to pet a slime.....)

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: I want to show the village that there isn't actually a threat.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Like,       proof that you defeated a foe.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Well yeah but they won't pay you for petting the problem..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: They pay you for getting rid of it.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: But there wasn’t a problem to begin with..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: That’s why you gotta act like it was one or else you wont get compensated.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: But that would imply the slime being a threat...

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Told you they won't compensate for that.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: But they won't hunt it down now.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: By the way,          how’s the memory going?

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Oh,      that reminds me.          What does the L stand for?

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Mhm.      First page of the Logbook.            Here..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: No worries.      I’ll get some food for us both.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Besides,        I wanted to mention it before anyway,         but what might help jog your memories might be books.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: I saw a library of sorts this morning.          Maybe you read about something familiar.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: That might help..     Good call.          Where is it?

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Edge of town.          You will see it if you follow the forest line around the market.         Can’t miss it.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Maybe I should write down daily events.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: This is harder than I thought..

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: I’ll just read a few and note down all the Important things..

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: How am I supposed to decide what books to read...

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: ...Guess these three are enough for now..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Didn’t know what you might like so I got you a spicy meat skewer.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Well,        I found some information about this world.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Even made some notes I see..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: (Unbelievable.         He actually didn’t flinch at all..)

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: (Ohhhh- I'm so jealous...         that looks so goooooddd)

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Something about magic.         And we are in a place called Fortiris...

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Don’t know much about Fortiris myself.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Just happened to stumble my way here and got lost.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Oh,       I was just about to skim through it.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Looked like it was about some interesting locations in Fortiris.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Thought it might show something I remember.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Mwhm.          Whad twid yu gwet by the wawy?

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Was a bit tough for my taste but I found some really good sweets!

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: These are way better than the last ones I had!           Want some?

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: ...Oh,        these locations seem to have “threat levels”.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Cause it’s just gonna make me want to go there even more.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Ah,       here is something.     “The lost valley”.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: It’s marked as a 3 out of 5 but someone has added 3 more markings.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: It reads that;          No one that has entered it’s foggy domain has ever returned.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Some even say the souls of the dead are trapped there and can be heard crying out on occasion.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Could be infested with ghosts!      Terrifying but tempting~        Sounds fun!

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: ...Wait-     who added 3 more marks if “nobody has ever returned”?

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Oh neat,         they even added a location for people to find it!

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Definitely “find it”.          This is written like a haunted house add.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: I wouldn’t be surprised if it was one actually,      Buuut-

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: -On the off chance that it isn't,         don't you wonder why it's called “Lost” Valley?

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Maybe.       I was more thinking something along the lines of “The lost city of Atlantis”.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Right.      Old city.       Lost to time..       And the ocean.        Ancient History.       Secret knowledge.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: We might find ourselves with riches beyond your imagination!

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Ah,       if a mortal wound can’t kill you some ghost can’t either.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Caaaause you would have to do the heavy lifting on that part!

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: I feel like I couldn’t stop you anyway..

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Well..       I must admit the “Secret knowledge” part intrigues me at least a bit..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Wonderful.        Wanna go back to the Inn?      It’s getting dark.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: You have spent quite the amount of time here..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: I checked on you twice before,         but you looked so invested in some books I didn't want to interrupt.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Welp,     I got to scout the area and village a bit more sooo,       I'm fine.     Ready to leave?

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: For how long did I even sleep..?

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (A blanket again..?      And Nora is gone again as well..)

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (Is she on the roof again?       It's still the middle of the night though..)

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: (Let me just..         slow steps..          don't slip.)

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Oh..      Might have been the spicy skewer..         My bad.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Well,        what can I do if my body won't allow me to rest..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Also,       you know you can sleep in the bed,         right?

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: I made sure to give you enough space for sure this time.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: I didn’t want to disturb you..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: I can sleep in air ducts.          You are barely a disturbance.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Of course.           I feel so lost...

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Heh..     That has nothing to do with the memory part trust me..

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: I feel like I have forgotten something very important.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: Like I lost a part of me.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Yeah..         The brain sometimes blocks out memories that are too painful to deal with.

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Memories that it would rather forget...

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: I'd rather be in pain than feel nothing at all...
It would be that those eyes stayed as innocent as they were back then..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: ...Hm??    ..Don’t tell me you are starting to go schizophrenic as well..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: At least luna can be seen clearly..

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: (“Rather feel pain than nothing at all”, huh...)

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: Are you cool with me just calling you “he”?

textBox.name: Nora
textBox.text: You being an “It” just..       Doesn’t sit right.

textBox.name: Zayn
textBox.text: As long as I know when you are referring to me.
